manipulators.description: right cmd to right ctrl when TeamViewer
left cmd to left ctrl when TeamViewer
option + shift + j = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
cmd + shift + j = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
command + j =  ctrl + shift + tab (prev tab)
option + shift + k = option + shift + down (duplicate and paste below)
command + k = control down focus app
option + shift + i = option + shift + up (copy line)
command + i = control up expose all
option + shift + l = option + shift + right (select word after)
cmd + shift + l = option + shift + right (select word after)
shift + cmd + u = command + shift + ` (prev window within app)
option + shift + u = select whole line to head
shift + cmd + o = command ` (next window within app)
